courses.name: architecture
courses.title: Software Architecture
courses.text: An essential discipline you need to solve complex problems through technological solutions and make it sustainable over time.

courses.name: k8s
courses.title: K8s for Architects
courses.text: Designed to provide Architects with the necessary tools to incorporate Cloud Native capabilities, focusing on the proper use of Kubernetes.

courses.name: api-product
courses.title: API as Product
courses.text: A training based on IT industry best practices, ensuring efficient solutions, scalability, consistency and simplicity of use by learning how to integrate every app and intern processes.

courses.name: product-manager
courses.title: Product Manager
courses.text: Incorporate technologies, methodologies and agile tools targeting the correct development and evolution of products, focusing on User Experience and data.

courses.name: agile-coach
courses.title: Agile Coach
courses.text: Become a leader and learn the necessary tools to assume an integrated role, with a high degree of authority and organizational seniority.

courses.name: ops-to-devops
courses.title: De Ops a DevOps
courses.text: Acquire comprehensive training covering all programming concerns and including active participation in the E2E development and maintenance of IT solutions.

courses.name: sre
courses.title: SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
courses.text: Google's implementation for DevOps, and today more and more companies are driven by its framework. Become an expert on the subject.

courses.name: blockchain
courses.title: Blockchain
courses.text: Understand Blockchain basics and decentralized applications (DApps), and how the data stored there is considered immutable.
